com.github.wuic.nut

Class AbstractConvertibleNut

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.wuic.nut.AbstractNut
      • com.github.wuic.nut.AbstractConvertibleNut
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConvertibleNut, Nut
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NotReachableNut, PipedConvertibleNut

    public abstract class AbstractConvertibleNut
extends AbstractNut
implements ConvertibleNut

    Base class for ConvertibleNut implementation with state management (attributes like transformers or referenced nuts). Transformation is delegated to subclass.

    Since:
    0.5.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Guillaume DROUET

        name - the nut's name
        ft - the nut's type
        comp - compressed or not
        c - cacheable or not
        a - aggregatable or not
        v - version number

      • getOriginalNuts

        public List<ConvertibleNut> getOriginalNuts()

        When this nut is the result of the transformation of another one, then it is actually a processed nut. This returns a list of original nuts that have been transformed to obtain this nut. When this nut is actually an non-transformed one, say an original nut, then the returned value should be null.

        Specified by:
        getOriginalNuts in interface ConvertibleNut
        Returns:
        the original nuts of this nut, null if this nut is actually original
